scripts.canai:validate: npm run typecheck:strict && npm run lint:strict && npm run format:check && npm run test:ci
scripts.canai:fix: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.canai:rules:check: node -e "console.log('✅ CanAI TypeScript Rules are active')"
scripts.canai:rules:validate: npm run canai:rules:check-config && npm run canai:rules:check-files && npm run canai:rules:check-cortex
scripts.canai:rules:check-config: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const config=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('.cursor.config.json','utf8')); const rules=['canai-typescript-rules','canai-structure-rules','canai-cortex-rules','canai-api-rules','canai-supabase-rules','canai-user-journey','canai-analytics-rules','canai-security-rules','canai-testing-rules']; const configStr=JSON.stringify(config); const missing=rules.filter(r=>!configStr.includes(r)); if(missing.length){console.error('❌ Missing rules:',missing); process.exit(1);} console.log('✅ All critical rules configured');"
scripts.canai:rules:check-files: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const rules=['canai-typescript-rules.mdc','canai-structure-rules.mdc','canai-cortex-rules.mdc','canai-api-rules.mdc','canai-supabase-rules.mdc','canai-user-journey.mdc','canai-analytics-rules.mdc','canai-security-rules.mdc','canai-testing-rules.mdc','cortex.md']; const missing=rules.filter(r=>!fs.existsSync('.cursor/rules/'+r)); if(missing.length){console.error('❌ Missing rule files:',missing); process.exit(1);} console.log('✅ All rule files exist');"
scripts.canai:rules:check-cortex: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('.cursor/rules/cortex.md')){console.log('⚠️ cortex.md not found'); process.exit(0);} const content=fs.readFileSync('.cursor/rules/cortex.md','utf8'); const milestones=content.split('\n').filter(l=>l.match(/^\[.*\]/)); const validFormat=milestones.filter(m=>m.match(/\[.*\].*-.*\[F[1-9]\].*-.*\[(Complete|In-Progress|Blocked|Planning|Testing)\]/)); console.log('✅ Cortex format validated:',validFormat.length,'valid milestones');"
scripts.canai:rules:enforce: npm run canai:rules:validate && npm run canai:validate
scripts.security:check: npm run security:audit && npm run lint:strict
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:strict: npm run canai:validate && npm run build
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run deploy:render:staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && npm run deploy:render:production
